name: BLING777BLING
description:
CASINOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

You enter a casino where you quickly become disoriented trying to find what you're looking for.

2 player local coop game. 

- The game is split screen and each side of the screen should be hidden from the other player.

- The game is best played with 2 gamepads.

- If gamepads aren't available, you can use WASD + 1 and 2 and the arrow keys + O and P.

- You can also use a sound card and separate each channel (left and right) into separate headphones for each player.
